newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar ends softer at 494.75/495.75/dlr.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar ends softer at 494.75/495.75/dlr.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed marginally softer in quiet trade at 494.75/495.75 per dollar, brokers said, with the Central Bank meeting most of the day's dollar needs.
The bolivar closed Friday at 494.50/495.50 per dollar. Monday was a market holiday.
"Some corporate demand emerged in the afternoon after a quiet morning," said one broker, adding that the Central Bank met most of the session's dollar demand.
Similarly quiet trade is expected to extend through the week, brokers said.
